There's an inconsistency to the overall design quality that really kept me at a distance while playing Kane & Lynch. [Dec 2007, p.75]
A highly competent – if not flawed – snowboarding game with a style comparable to no other.
Nowhere near as good as the full-priced alternatives - but you're still guaranteed a pretty good time.
Repetitive puzzles and poor camera control will have you cursing as often as you are laughing.
The game is definitely over-priced. With that said, this is still one of the most engaging new multiplayer-only games out there.
